segments.text: Wow, I didn't expect to see the sink flooding like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on full blast, and no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes right in front, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, kids on a mission for cookies—unexpected teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing precariously, but grabbing those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful with her hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a perfect garden; what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple kitchen could hide so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming, stool wobbling—it's all happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies must be tempting to risk it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral face amid the chaos is the real shocker.
segments.speaker: PAR
